function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shifts in behavior towards pro-environmental approach are driven by threat and coping appraisal","Impact":"Increased focus on environmental responsibility may lead to neglect of other health and safety measures","Mitigation":"Educating individuals about the importance of balancing environmental responsibility with health and safety measures","Technologies":"Educational campaigns, public health messaging","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic can push individuals towards environmental responsibility","Impact":"Neglect of other health and safety measures in favor of environmental responsibility","Mitigation":"Promoting a holistic approach to health and sustainability","Technologies":"Education, public health messaging","People":"General population","Owner":"Government, environmental organizations"}]}
